data.title: Love Love Love Pedro's!
data.text:
I have been to the Brazil Cafe (the shack) at 2121 University. Loved it. . . So, headed out this weekend and wanted to give Pedro's a try for dinner. The interior is super fun as are the other Brazil Cafe's. We sat out in the back patio. Really nice. 
Started with the linguisa small plate (Sliced Brazilian sausage served with grilled onions, Brazilian vinaigrette, cilantro-garlic sauce and sliced bread)...awesome awesome awesome.
Chicken tostada small plate.. was good, but overshadowed by the linguisa.
Then we split the pork sandwich. This was great as well. Super tender pork in a great sauce on a french bread roll. 
It was fun, on a nice warm evening to enjoy some casual really good food here.

data.title: Laisse à désirer
data.text:
Mon amie m'a proposé de déjeuner et ne connaissent pas je ne m'y suis pas opposé, grande erreur!
La Terrace est très agréable mais ça se limite à ça! 
J'ai l'impression que l'hygiène n'est pas leur fort et la préparation de simples salades non plus!

data.title: Gostinho de Brasil
data.text: Uma ótima opção para quem está loge de casa e quer se deliciar com pão de queijo, brigadeiro e feijoada. Bem próximo ao prédio da UC Berkeley Extension.
